name: Ministry of Internal Affairs
mission: To ensure public safety, national security, and the protection of constitutional order.
description: The Ministry of Internal Affairs is responsible for law enforcement, emergency services, border management, and public safety across Georgia.

name: Ministry of Education
mission: To provide accessible, quality education and foster lifelong learning for all Georgian citizens.
description: The Ministry of Education oversees all levels of education, from primary to higher education, and promotes educational excellence and innovation.

name: Ministry of Economics
mission: To drive sustainable economic growth, attract investment, and enhance Georgia's competitiveness.
description: The Ministry of Economics develops economic policy, attracts foreign investment, supports entrepreneurship, and manages trade relations.

name: Ministry of Health
mission: To provide accessible, equitable, and high-quality healthcare services to all Georgian citizens.
description: The Ministry of Health oversees healthcare policy, hospital management, public health initiatives, and pandemic preparedness.

name: Ministry of Environment
mission: To protect Georgia's natural heritage and ensure sustainable environmental management.
description: The Ministry of Environment develops environmental policy, manages natural resources, and promotes sustainability and conservation.

name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs
mission: To advance Georgia's interests on the international stage and strengthen global relationships.
description: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs manages diplomatic relations, international negotiations, and cultural exchange programs.
